channel.title: Construction problem.. askes for skilling area [ pi ]
channel.description: When i teleport to my construction place its all good until i try to construc every time i try it tells me to be in skilling area first..... i dont get it Please help me fix ive tried removing it dint work all those basic things ive tried.......

and theres no
